comment:
* {@hide}
 *
 * The DecoderCapabilities class is used to retrieve the types of the
 * video and audio decoder(s) supported on a specific Android platform.

methods.name: public static List<VideoDecoder> getVideoDecoders()
methods.comment:
* Returns the list of video decoder types
     * @see android.media.DecoderCapabilities.VideoDecoder

methods.name: public static List<AudioDecoder> getAudioDecoders()
methods.comment:
* Returns the list of audio decoder types
     * @see android.media.DecoderCapabilities.AudioDecoder

methods.name: private static final native void native_init()
private static final native int native_get_num_video_decoders()
private static final native int native_get_video_decoder_type(int index)
private static final native int native_get_num_audio_decoders()
private static final native int native_get_audio_decoder_type(int index)
